executive_summary.headline: FjordHQ IS ACTIVELY LEARNING
key_findings: 361 beliefs generated across 361 distinct assets in 46 hours
All 4 canonical regimes represented (BULL, BEAR, NEUTRAL, STRESS)
Entropy DECREASING from 0.699 to 0.520 (system becoming more precise)
Stability score INCREASING from 0.651 to 0.741 (system becoming more confident)
104 suppressions logged with full audit trail (all HYSTERESIS category)
Belief-policy divergence rate: 29% - system is actively making policy decisions
Fragility score DECREASING from 0.50 to 0.41 (system becoming less fragile)
